attributes.action: Reform government to abolish pay over £60,000 for all Government and council staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well i for one am tired of whitehall and our local councils draining our financies under the guise of doing this country a service. I would rather we removed anyone who financially abused our system and are paid higher than the prime minister. 

If Tony and Gordon can live on £60,000 then so can everyone else. I have heard some MP's comment on the number of hours they have to do but i would always be able to find someone on less than them financially who do more hours and travel more, so in short i ask to remove these drains on the tax payers money and cap public sector pay for any "fat cats" in government and council employment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
